title: Clean, modern and satisfying
text:
I loved the hotel, they have a great service and clean rooms. The WiFi is great. The serve a good breakfast and free coffee and tea.
They have a parking if you have a car.
The staff is very friendly and polite.

title: Big portion, gd Quality
text:
The portions were big with a good taste
We ordered zucchini balls, Greek salad, chips, feta pie and octopus plate.
Tasteful and delicious.

title: Not bad, good price
text:
The food is not bad comparing to the price
The salad is tasteless
Fries is good
Close to the beach ..

title: 5 euros bed and umbrella, free parking
text:
I loved the place
Crowded but nice
A lot of youth people
The water is really clean
Toilets are free
Shower by 1 euro

title: Calm, clean & average price
text:
The hotel is clean, rooms are big
We took one suite with two bed rooms
It is good for couples and families
Close to aya Napa beaches
Nissi beach is like 15 min walking and 5 min by bus (1,5 euro)
The breakfast is not bad

title: Great location, close to the center
text:
The hotel was really good , close to everything including the amazing restaurant and the downtown

The hotel also has a great breakfast buffet and a nice outdoor setting

Try to book very early so you can take a good price

title: Amazing food, small portion
text:
The pasta was really fresh and delicious, although the portion was really small
The pizza was good as well
The prices are average
place: Ristorante Flipper Di Alborno Libero E C. Snc

title: Delicious food, pick salad
text:
The food was good, for me the salad was amazing comparing with the pizza
The price was really good
I think it will be max 20€ for one person

title: Amazing place to take pictures
text:
The place were really nice, good and positive vibes with very variety of nationalities
The place was really incridable

title: Big portion, tasteless food
text:
The dishes were really big and the presentation was very good. But the taste of the food was really poor
Although the prices were not expensive

title: Good coffee, good price 3€
text:
The frappe is good comparing to the price which is 3€
The location is very nice, in the middle of the street you can set and see the walkers around you

title: Good location, friendly stuff
text:
The location is very close to everything, you can go by walk to Pláka and psyri.
The receptionist is very friendly, he gave us a lot of restaurants and places recommendations.
The internet is a little bit slow.
The room is well clean and it smells good

title: artificial flavors, good concept
text:
If you want to taste some artificial flavors
You can try this place.
For me it was a great one time experience with the pinky box not more
The ice cream is like 3€ but it worth 0.5€

title: Big portion, average price
text:
The food was good, but you should know what to order
The Rose wine was terrible, I recommend the Greek salad, Mashroom appetizer, frensh fries and souvlaki plate

title: Average price, it can be better
text:
The food is not bad, don’t order something not Greek.
The portion is big, price is good
You can pay 20€ for two

title: Don’t eat in Plaka
text:
The restaurants there are very commercial
The secret is to go to the restaurants that close to Plaka and local go to it.
Look at the menu, if you found the Greek salad price upper than 8 € don’t even think about it

title: Too much sugar
text:
The desert is like Arabic (lukaimat) or the American donuts
It’s good but too much sugar and calories
You can take one dish for 4 people

title: Amazing view, good for pictures
text: Amazing place to take pictures, don’t bring juice they don’t let you take it inside. Just water. It’s tiring if you are not a walk fan

title: Good portion, amazing taste
text: The burger taste is amazing, don’t take mustard just ketchup. Choose dirty burger or pax one because they are different

title: Amazing garden, calm area
text:
The hotel is a little bit far from downtown, you need about 15 min to reach the town.
But it is a very nice hotel with amazing calm area
The spa is wonderful
Breakfast is amazing
The internet is high speed

title: Amazing place, great pictures
text:
You can go there and enjoy feeling like you are in old movies about history of Europe
There is a lot of restaurant you can have lunch in there.

title: Great location, good rooms
text:
The hotel doesn’t look like a five stars hotel
The internet inside the rooms is very slow
It doesn’t have a spa or gym or pool
It has a roof top with avreage view
Its has an air condition and it’s good
There is a tv and espresso machine

title: Kitchen still open till 11 , big portion
text:
We had standered burger and it was good
The place is not wow
But the kitchen still open till 11 pm when all the kitchen closes at 10

title: Nice steak, good saad
text:
We oredered lunch steak and it was very good with mushroom sauce
The tiger prawn salad was very good with all the shrimps and avocado in it.

title: Fresh ingredients, quick service
text:
The pizza was not bad, but the mozzarella salad with roca and Bassel was amazing and fresh.
Pasta was good, the mood at that place is very friendly

title: Not Generous, low quality
text:
Very commercial food, low quality
Bad presentations
I asked for Basel on the salad, the waiter brought one leaf
Its really poor restaurant

title: Burger is really wow
text:
The burger was amazing with the fries
Beer is so good
The place is amazing when you sit outside and enjoy the fresh air

title: Good flight, on time
text:
it was a good flight, the crew was a little bit rude.
but still good because it was on time
the captain was professional in taking off and landing

title: Amazing place to take photos
text:
It was an amazing place
I took a lot of photos there
Very big place
You should bring ur food with u because there is one restaurant and it sucks

title: Old place, nice walk
text:
You can walk and see the old mosque
And take pics there
Don’t buy anything from there because you can see all the sevoniers in the big markets for cheaper

title: Amazing feeling, nice place
text:
When you are there, you feel like relaxed and amazed.
Full of tourist from all over the world.
You don’t have to pay to go into the space.

title: Very bad experience
text:
First of all, I choosed this airline because their planes land in Orly airport in Paris.
The first flight from Beirut airport to Orly Paris delayed about one hour. The space between chairs in plan were very small.
The Meals were terrible.
The second trip were delayed one hour also.
The boarding crew asked us to make boarding and we wait like one hour in the corridor waiting for a plane to come with no Air conditions and no chairs to sit.
The people were sitting on the floor, the children screaming all the time and everyone complaining from the delay.
I am going to email the airline company to see what they are going to reply.

title: Amazing hotel with the price
text:
The hotel was amazing, the price is very good
No refrigerator or phone in the room.
The hotel crew were so friendly.
Nice view from floor five and above
The breakfast was good with 10€ price for one person

title: Not friendly, far from downtown
text:
After having stayed at axel Madrid, and it was great. We were very disappointed in Barcelona. The staff is not friendly, not helpful, the rooms are very close to the street, pedestrians were looking at our room, so we had to keep the window closed. We also got pick pocketed and the hotel staff seemed not to care and didn’t offer help.
The bar tender is arrogant,
Room:,the toilet seat was broken, we had to ask for a duvet as they only offer flat sheets.
The hotel is located in a residential zone, far from all attractions.
One good thing, the roof top pool.

title: Bad music, not bad food
text:
The music was really bad
Starters were good
Plates were avreage
Glasses smell was bas
Price was avreage
Over all it was not bad

title: Amazing mood with an amazing experience
text: Its a very nice place when you can do shopping with nice music, a lot of restaurant and good places to set and take photos with an amazing colors every where

title: Tapas is good, avreage price
text:
We ate tapas and it was good
The atmosphere was amazing
Reservation is better
Close to the metro station

title: Very rare meat, not friendly
text:
First of all, they don’t know how to say hi
When I said hello, they said how can I help you
The burger meat is sooo rare and not that good
The Sause is under the avreage taste
The fries were good or not bad if we can say that

title: Commercial and no taste
text:
The food is very commercial, it’s over priced if u look at the quality of the food
The only thing good is the quick service and nice area.

title: Nice and fresh
text:
Avreage food, nice seating
Close to The beach
The waiters are friendly and know what do you want to eat
Try it if u r hangry and want to hang out

title: Small portions, taste good
text:
The food is good not wow, it serves small portions.
Do not go at night because the staff was very tired so serve.

title: Amazing view
text:
You don’t need to pay and go inside
I think it’s enough to see it from outside
Amazing view, be careful from the thiefs.

title: Delicious food, friendly staff
text:
The food is amazing, the sangria drink was more than wow. Its a very nice place to visit
Clean place and the staff is sooo friendly.

title: Rude staff, bad experience
text: I called them and asked for a reservation and they said yes.when I reached the place they told me that there is no place and they were soooo rude. When I told the supervisor that I will write a bad review on trip advisor for you, she said I don’t care.

title: Over priced, over rated
text:
The paella was average, but at the Menu the place price is 22€ but you have to order two at least, so you can not eat paella by your self and you have bring a partner and pay 44€ at least for two medium plates.
The drink was bad and over priced.
Shortly, find some place has same paella with less price.

title: Amazing feeling in an amazing place
text: When I reach the place, I felt a very different feeling. It was like a dream or an old story from the history book.

title: Good but too sweet
text: Its a good place, the stuff is very very friendly, the food is delicious but sweet of you like salty food.

title: Aaammmaazing hotel
text:
Very intimate place, straight friendly. The stuff is very nice and close. The hotel is close to the center of the city and you can go anywhere by walk.
It has an amazing rooftop with bar and small pool.

title: Good food, nice atmosphere
text: It has a good atmosphere, not super food but you can say 7 on 10. You can set inside or outside up on you. Not so friendly stuff but very gay friendly.

title: Close to everything
text: It is an average hotel, the staff is not friendly, But at least it is clean and serve breakfast. You can choose it if your budget is avreage as well. Nice view but you can not check in before 3 o’clock .

title: overpriced, overrated and dirty
text:
overpriced, overrated and dirty, he asked me to put a bresaola instead of ham for free, and it was extra charge on the receipt.
A lot of flies in the restaurant

title: Cool and nice
text:
Amazing atmosphere, delicious food
it is Not that expensive
And in the end : dessert on the house....
